title: Ep. 859 - Wokeness Is America's Dominant Religion
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, a new survey reveals that huge numbers of Americans have left religion in recent years, especially since COVID. But that’s not actually correct. Americans aren’t leaving religion. They’re going from one religion to a different one. I’ll explain. Also, Ron DeSantis continues to lead the charge against wokeness in the school system. And airline CEOs try to explain why it’s stupid to require masks on planes. Plus, a leading climate activist and “scientist” calls for more censorship of “climate denialism.” And in our Daily Cancellation, Kamala Harris is canceled, but perhaps not for the reasons you may think.
